laboratory_examinations.findings: Severe hypoglycemia occurred (sensor glucose â‰¤50 mg/dL) during therapy with pasireotide.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Severe hypoglycemia occurred only during Period C of pasireotide therapy after previously being controlled with DZX.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Instrumental Workup (includes MRI, CT, and Scintigraphy)
laboratory_examinations.findings: An 8.0-mm benign insulinoma relapse was identified, characterized as Ki-67 = 1%, WHO grading = G1.
Altered glucose regulation within the prediabetes range (hemoglobin A1c = 41 mmol/mol).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A progressive increase in prediabetes range was detected at the follow-up visits.
